title: Correction: Invasive Plant Suppresses the Growth of Native Tree Seedlings by Disrupting Belowground Mutualisms
fullText: In the Materials and Methods section, the amount of water used on the plants in Experiment 3 is listed incorrectly. The correct amount is: 400 ml.
